page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: At 5:00pm we have tea, sandwiches and cake. At 5:30pm my sister goes to brownies in the village hall. Dad comes home from work at the radio station in Burnham at 5:15pm. He has a cup of tea and reads his newspaper.At 6.00p.m. Ben and I go to the playing fields to play cricket with other from the village at 6.30 p.m. mum and dad have their evening meal and at 7.00p.m., my sister comes home from brownies. Our hamsters wake up so we give them some food.At half past eight, we go to bed and mum and dad watch television and at elven o clock, they go to bed.
